pacman.entries.ghosts.fair.ants

Class ExplorerAnt

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.entries.ghosts.fair.ants.Ant
      • pacman.entries.ghosts.fair.ants.ExplorerAnt

  • public class ExplorerAnt
extends Ant
    The ExplorerAnts are sent out from Ms. Pac-Man's position. They are intended to mark the possible paths Ms. Pac-Man might take for the HunterAnts.
    Author:
    Iris Hunkeler
